channel.title: The Woodlands: Pokémon Rescue Team
channel.description:
---------------------------------------![pokemon%20mystery%20dungeon%201|291x277](upload://rzj3fff5sCPcZ5wOU9NHLB958mJ.jpeg) ----------------------------------------
There's still room for more rescuers in our tale of small Pokémon doing their best to help other Pokémon in need — especially after a mysterious attack at a party left all of the other rescue teams trapped in an endless sleep!
Come help Team Pyrite unravel the machinations of the evil Team Mischief and save the town!
[date=2019-02-11 time=22:00:00 timezone="America/Sao_Paulo"] → [date=2019-02-12 time=13:00:00 timezone="America/Sao_Paulo"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LWgfMb9jxApVecA9Ctv)
[date=2019-02-18 time=22:00:00 timezone="America/Sao_Paulo"] → [date=2019-02-19 time=13:00:00 timezone="America/Sao_Paulo"] [Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LWgfj7712KwgbWBZg2P)
[date=2019-02-25 time=22:00:00 timezone="America/Sao_Paulo"] → [date=2019-02-26 time=13:00:00 timezone="America/Sao_Paulo"] [Session 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LWgfrdPsLoYUEFxgigs)

@Luiz wrote:

--------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------

There’s still room for more rescuers in our tale of small Pokémon doing their best to help other Pokémon in need — especially after a mysterious attack at a party left all of the other rescue teams trapped in an endless sleep!

Come help Team Pyrite unravel the machinations of the evil Team Mischief and save the town!
